content: <!DOCTYPE html>About Us - Gajab JobsAbout UsWelcome to Gajab JobsGajab Jobs is your trusted source for the latest government jobs, yojana updates, career opportunities, and educational resources. We aim to provide accurate, timely, and easy-to-understand information to help students, job seekers, and individuals stay updated with important news and opportunities.Our MissionOur mission is to simplify the job search process and make government schemes (Yojanas) accessible to everyone. We believe in empowering people with authentic information that can help them build a better career and future.Our VisionTo become India’s most reliable online platform for government job alerts, yojana updates, and educational guidance. We strive to be a bridge between opportunities and the people who need them most.What We OfferLatest government job notificationsStep-by-step guides for filling formsUpdates on government schemes (Yojanas)Exam preparation tips and study materialCareer-related articles and insightsGet in TouchWe’d love to hear from you! If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, feel free to reach out. 📧 Email: yojnaportalhelp@gmail.com © 2025 Gajab Jobs. All Rights Reserved.

However, users are advised to verify details such as eligibility, dates, and official notifications directly from the respective government websites before applying.No LiabilityGajab Jobs will not be responsible for any losses, damages, or misunderstandings that occur as a result of using the information provided on this website. content:
<!DOCTYPE html>Privacy Policy - Gajab JobsPrivacy PolicyAt Gajab Jobs (https://www.gajabjobs.com), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard the data you share with us.Information We CollectPersonal details (like name, email) if you contact us directly.Non-personal data such as browser type, IP address, and pages visited.Cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience.How We Use Your InformationYour information may be used to:
Respond to your queries or feedback.Improve our website and services.Send job alerts, yojana updates, or newsletters (only if you subscribe).Ensure security and prevent fraud.Cookies PolicyWe use cookies to analyze website traffic and enhance your browsing experience. You may choose to disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.Third-Party ServicesGajab Jobs may display ads (such as Google AdSense) or use analytics tools. These third-party services may collect information in accordance with their own privacy policies.Data ProtectionWe take appropriate measures to secure your personal information and prevent unauthorized access. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.Children’s PrivacyOur services are not directed at children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.Changes to This PolicyWe may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with the “last updated” date.Contact UsIf you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us: 📧 yojnaportalhelp@gmail.com© 2025 Gajab Jobs. All Rights Reserved.

Registration in MP Paramedical Council Bihar BPSC AES Notification 2025 : How To Apply Visit the Official Website: Go to the official BTSC website btsc.bihar.gov.inRead the Official Notification: Carefully read the complete advertisement/notification for eligibility and instructions.Register as a New User: If you are a new user, click on "New Registration" and fill in the basic details to create your account.Login to Your Account: Use your registered email/mobile number and password to log in.Fill the Application Form: Enter personal details, qualifications, and other required information.Upload Documents: Upload scanned copies of your photograph, signature, and relevant documents.Pay the Application Fee: Pay the fee online via Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking / UPI.Preview and Submit: Check all details carefully and submit the form.Print the Final Application Form: After successful submission, download or print the final application form for your records.
